name: Grilled Skirt Steak with Roasted Potatoes
author: Elizabeth
summary: Steak and potatoes, perfectly seasoned, grilled, and baked to perfection in about 30 minutes. This recipe was made in a Panasonic CIO.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, or more to taste
directions: Combine ketchup, Worcestershire sauce, 2 cloves of garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, and 1/2 teaspoon pepper in a small dish or resealable plastic bag
Mix potatoes, remaining 2 cloves garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon pepper, and oil together in a bowl
Place grill pan in the Panasonic® Countertop Induction Oven
Press "Auto Cook" and select setting 4, 12-inch size
Mix potatoes, return to oven, set the timer for 5 minutes, and press "Start
" Transfer potatoes to a serving plate
Preheat oven to High on the "Grill" setting
Wipe off any garlic from the grill pan with a paper towel
Remove steak from marinade and add to the pan
Grill steak for 1 minute per side
Remove and let rest for 3 minutes
Slice steak and serve with roasted potatoes
